title: PMS 2.0 521 - Thursday Night Football Preview, Ian Rapoport, Charissa Thompson, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ, and the boys  chat about tonight's Thursday Night Football game between the Browns and Broncos, the long list of players that will be out for the Browns, what Case Keenum performing well tonight would mean for the Browns, how this impacts everything going on with Baker Mayfield, how difficult it was picking tonight's Risk Free Same Game Parlay exclusively on FanDuel, and much much more. Later, NFL Network Insider Ian Rapoport joins the show to chat about the mounting injuries for tonight's game, whether or not Jarvis Landry is going to go, all the different rumors surrounding Deshaun Watson to the Dolphins being a done deal, if Xavien Howard might be on the move, more on the Baker Mayfield situation, and everything else we need to know around the league to get us ready for Week 7 of the NFL season (39:55-1:05:59). Later, Fox NFL Sunday reporter, co-host of the Calm Down Podcast with Erin Andrews, Charissa Thompson joins the show to chat about her career path getting to where she's at now, what NFL Sunday's are like for her, what her ultimate career goals are, working in the Rodeo, and much more (1:06:03-1:22:12). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
